nodes.text: Miwy Joy was a female Twi'lek who was one of Cham Syndulla's  freedom fighters during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, she was one of the Twi'leks that were massacred by the CIS forces during the initial stages of the Battle of Ryloth. After her death, Miwy Joy was among the freedom fighters that were buried in a graveyard on their homeworld. Her name was inscribed in Aurebesh on the gravestone.
